about_the_game: Gain an advantage in the nightmare with a flashlight or laser that detects nearby threats. They will turn from white to red when enemies are near, giving you additional time to prepare or flee. You can choose to equip either individually or as a pair. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
